mapper.select: SELECT BF.FILE_SRC, M.MOVIE_TITLE, G.GRADE_COUNT, R.RCONTENT, R.RECOMMEND_COUNT, R.RCREATE_DATE, G.DIVISION FROM MOVIE M, GRADE G, REPLY R, BOARD B, BOARD_FILE BF WHERE M.MOVIE_ID = B.MOVIE_ID AND B.BOARD_ID = R.BID AND M.MOVIE_ID = G.MOVIE_ID AND B.BOARD_ID = BF.BOARD_ID AND BF.FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND R.RWRITER = #{ mid } AND G.DIVISION = 'MOVIE' AND B.CINEMA_DIV = 'MOVIE' AND R.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT T.THEATER_NAME, G.GRADE_COUNT, R.RCONTENT, R.RECOMMEND_COUNT, R.RCREATE_DATE FROM THEATER T, REPLY R, GRADE G, MEMBER M, BOARD B WHERE G.THEATER_ID = T.THEATER_ID AND G.MID = M.MID AND M.MID = R.RWRITER AND B.BOARD_ID = R.BID AND R.RWRITER = #{ mid } AND G.DIVISION = 'THEATER' AND B.CINEMA_DIV = 'CINEMA' AND R.STATUS = 'Y'
